Ability.Name: Stench
Ability.Description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

Ability.Name: Drizzle
Ability.Description: The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle.

Ability.Name: Speed Boost
Ability.Description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Ability.Name: Battle Armor
Ability.Description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Ability.Name: Sturdy
Ability.Description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

Ability.Name: Damp
Ability.Description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

Ability.Name: Limber
Ability.Description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

Ability.Name: Sandveil
Ability.Description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

Ability.Name: Static
Ability.Description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

Ability.Name: Volt Absorb
Ability.Description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

Ability.Name: Water Absorb
Ability.Description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

Ability.Name: Oblivious
Ability.Description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

Ability.Name: Cloud Nine
Ability.Description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Ability.Name: Compound Eyes
Ability.Description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

Ability.Name: Insomnia
Ability.Description: Prevent's the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Ability.Name: Color Change
Ability.Description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

Ability.Name: Immunity
Ability.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

Ability.Name: Flash Fire
Ability.Description: Powers up Fire-Type moves if hit by one.

Ability.Name: Shield Dust
Ability.Description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Ability.Name: Own Tempo
Ability.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

Ability.Name: Suction Cups
Ability.Description: Negates all moves that force switching out.

Ability.Name: Intimidate
Ability.Description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

Ability.Name: Shadow Tag
Ability.Description: Prevents the foe from escaping.

Ability.Name: Rough Skin
Ability.Description: Inflicts damage on the foe on contact.

Ability.Name: Wonder Guard
Ability.Description: Only super-effective moves will hit.

Ability.Name: Levitate
Ability.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-Type moves.

Ability.Name: Effect Spore
Ability.Description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

Ability.Name: Synchronize
Ability.Description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

Ability.Name: Clear Body
Ability.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Ability.Name: Natural Cure
Ability.Description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

Ability.Name: Lightning Rod
Ability.Description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Ability.Name: Serene Grace
Ability.Description: Boosts the liklihood of added effects appearing.

Ability.Name: Swift Swim
Ability.Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain."

Ability.Name: Chlorophyll
Ability.Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunlight.

Ability.Name: Illuminate
Ability.Description: Raises the liklihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Trace
Ability.Description: The Pokémon copies a foe's ability.

Ability.Name: Huge Power
Ability.Description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Ability.Name: Poison Point
Ability.Description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

Ability.Name: Inner Focus
Ability.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

Ability.Name: Magma Armor
Ability.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

Ability.Name: Water Veil
Ability.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Ability.Name: Magnet Pull
Ability.Description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

Ability.Name: Soundproof
Ability.Description: Gives full immunity to sound-based moves.

Ability.Name: Rain Dish
Ability.Description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

Ability.Name: Sand Stream
Ability.Description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

Ability.Name: Pressure
Ability.Description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

Ability.Name: Thick Fat
Ability.Description: Ups resistance to Fire-type and Ice-type moves.

Ability.Name: Early Bird
Ability.Description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

Ability.Name: Flame Body
Ability.Description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

Ability.Name: Run Away
Ability.Description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Keen Eye
Ability.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

Ability.Name: Hyper Cutter
Ability.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

Ability.Name: Pick Up
Ability.Description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

Ability.Name: Truant
Ability.Description: The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

Ability.Name: Hustle
Ability.Description: Boosts the Attack stat, but loweres accuracy.

Ability.Name: Cute Charm
Ability.Description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

Ability.Name: Plus
Ability.Description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Ability.Name: Minus
Ability.Description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Ability.Name: Forecast
Ability.Description: Castform transforms with the weather.

Ability.Name: Sticky Hold
Ability.Description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

Ability.Name: Shed Skin
Ability.Description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

Ability.Name: Guts
Ability.Description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

Ability.Name: Marvel Scale
Ability.Description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

Ability.Name: Liquid Ooze
Ability.Description: Damages Attackers using any draining move.

Ability.Name: Overgrow
Ability.Description: Boosts Grass-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Blaze
Ability.Description: Boosts Fire-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Torrent
Ability.Description: Boosts Water-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Swarm
Ability.Description: Boosts Bug-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Rock Head
Ability.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Ability.Name: Drought
Ability.Description: Turns the sunlight harsh in battle.

Ability.Name: Arena Trap
Ability.Description: Prevents the for from fleeing

Ability.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Ability.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Ability.Name: Pure Power
Ability.Description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Ability.Name: Shell Armor
Ability.Description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Ability.Name: Air Lock
Ability.Description: Elimates the effects of weather.

Ability.Name: Tangled Feet
Ability.Description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

Ability.Name: Motor Drive
Ability.Description: Raises Speed if hit with an Electric-type attack.

Ability.Name: Rivalry
Ability.Description: Deals more damage to a foe of the same gender.

Ability.Name: Steadfast
Ability.Description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

Ability.Name: Snow Cloak
Ability.Description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

Ability.Name: Gluttony
Ability.Description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

Ability.Name: Anger Point
Ability.Description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

Ability.Name: Unburden
Ability.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

Ability.Name: Heatproof
Ability.Description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Ability.Name: Simple
Ability.Description: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

Ability.Name: Dry Skin
Ability.Description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

Ability.Name: Download
Ability.Description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

Ability.Name: Iron Fist
Ability.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

Ability.Name: Poison Heal
Ability.Description: Restores HP if poisoned.

Ability.Name: Adaptability
Ability.Description: Powers up moves of the same type.

Ability.Name: Skill Link
Ability.Description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Ability.Name: Hydration
Ability.Description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

Ability.Name: Solar Power
Ability.Description: In sunlight, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases."\

Ability.Name: Quick Feet
Ability.Description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

Ability.Name: Normalize
Ability.Description: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

Ability.Name: Sniper
Ability.Description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

Ability.Name: Magic Guard
Ability.Description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Ability.Name: No Guard
Ability.Description: Ensures that attacks by and against the Pokémon land.

Ability.Name: Stall
Ability.Description: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

Ability.Name: Technician
Ability.Description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

Ability.Name: Leaf Guard
Ability.Description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

Ability.Name: Klutz
Ability.Description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

Ability.Name: Mold Breaker
Ability.Description: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.

Ability.Name: Super Luck
Ability.Description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

Ability.Name: Aftermath
Ability.Description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

Ability.Name: Anticipation
Ability.Description: Senses a foe's dangerous move.

Ability.Name: Forewarn
Ability.Description: Determines what moves a foe has.

Ability.Name: Unaware
Ability.Description: Ignores any stat changes in the foe.

Ability.Name: Tinted Lens
Ability.Description: Powers up "not very effective" moves.

Ability.Name: Filter
Ability.Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

Ability.Name: Slow Start
Ability.Description: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

Ability.Name: Scrappy
Ability.Description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Storm Drain
Ability.Description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

Ability.Name: Ice Body
Ability.Description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

Ability.Name: Solid Rock
Ability.Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

Ability.Name: Snow Warning
Ability.Description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

Ability.Name: Honey Gather
Ability.Description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

Ability.Name: Frisk
Ability.Description: The Pokémon checks the foe's held item.

Ability.Name: Reckless
Ability.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

Ability.Name: Multitype
Ability.Description: Changes type to match the held Plate.

Ability.Name: Flower Gift
Ability.Description: Powers up the party Pokémon when in sunlight.

Ability.Name: Bad Dreams
Ability.Description: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP.

Ability.Name: Pickpocket
Ability.Description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Sheer Force
Ability.Description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

Ability.Name: Contrary
Ability.Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Ability.Name: Unnerve
Ability.Description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat berries.

Ability.Name: Defiant
Ability.Description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

Ability.Name: Defeatist
Ability.Description: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

Ability.Name: Cursed Body
Ability.Description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Healer
Ability.Description: May heal an ally's status condition.

Ability.Name: Friend Guard
Ability.Description: Reduces damage done to allies.

Ability.Name: Weak Armor
Ability.Description: Physical attacks lower defense and raise Speed.

Ability.Name: Heavy Metal
Ability.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

Ability.Name: Light Metal
Ability.Description: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

Ability.Name: Multiscale
Ability.Description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Ability.Name: Toxic Boost
Ability.Description: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

Ability.Name: Flare Boost
Ability.Description: Powers up special attacks when burned.

Ability.Name: Harvest
Ability.Description: May create another Berry after one is used.

Ability.Name: Telepathy
Ability.Description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

Ability.Name: Moody
Ability.Description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

Ability.Name: Overcoat
Ability.Description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

Ability.Name: Poison Touch
Ability.Description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

Ability.Name: Regenerator
Ability.Description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

Ability.Name: Big Pecks
Ability.Description: Protects from Defense-lowering attacks.

Ability.Name: Sand Rush
Ability.Description: Boosts a Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

Ability.Name: Wonder Skin
Ability.Description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

Ability.Name: Analytic
Ability.Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

Ability.Name: Illusion
Ability.Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

Ability.Name: Imposter
Ability.Description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

Ability.Name: Infiltrator
Ability.Description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

Ability.Name: Mummy
Ability.Description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this ability.

Ability.Name: Moxie
Ability.Description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Justified
Ability.Description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

Ability.Name: Rattled
Ability.Description: Some move types scare it and boosts its speed.

Ability.Name: Magic Bounce
Ability.Description: Reflects status-changing moves.

Ability.Name: Sap Sipper
Ability.Description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

Ability.Name: Prankster
Ability.Description: Gives priority to a status move.

Ability.Name: Sand Force
Ability.Description: Boost certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

Ability.Name: Iron Barbs
Ability.Description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

Ability.Name: Zen Mode
Ability.Description: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is halved.

Ability.Name: Victory Star
Ability.Description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

Ability.Name: Turboblaze
Ability.Description: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.

Ability.Name: Teravolt
Ability.Description: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.

Ability.Name: Aerilate
Ability.Description: Normal-type move become Flying-type moves.

Ability.Name: Aroma Veil
Ability.Description: Protects allies from attacks that effect their mental state.

Ability.Name: Aura Break
Ability.Description: The effect of Aura Abilities are reversed.

Ability.Name: Bulletproof
Ability.Description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

Ability.Name: Cheek Pouch
Ability.Description: Restores all HP when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

Ability.Name: Competitive
Ability.Description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

Ability.Name: Dark Aura
Ability.Description: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

Ability.Name: Fairy Aura
Ability.Description: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

Ability.Name: Flower Veil
Ability.Description: Prevents lowere of ally Grass-type Pokémon stats.

Ability.Name: Fur Coat
Ability.Description: Halves damage from physical moves.

Ability.Name: Gale Wings
Ability.Description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

Ability.Name: Gooey
Ability.Description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Ability.Name: Grass Pelt
Ability.Description: Boosts the Defense stat when the terrain is grass.

Ability.Name: Magician
Ability.Description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon if it hits with a move.

Ability.Name: Mega Launcher
Ability.Description: Powers up Aura and Pulse moves.

Ability.Name: Parental Bond
Ability.Description: Parent and child attack together.

Ability.Name: Pixilate
Ability.Description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type.

Ability.Name: Protean
Ability.Description: Chages the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it just used.

Ability.Name: Refrigerate
Ability.Description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type.

Ability.Name: Stance Change
Ability.Description: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

Ability.Name: Strong Jaw
Ability.Description: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

Ability.Name: Sweet Veil
Ability.Description: Prevents ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

Ability.Name: Symbiosis
Ability.Description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

Ability.Name: Tough Claws
Ability.Description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

Ability.Name: Delta Stream
Ability.Description: Affects weather and eliminates all of the Flying-type's weaknesses.

Ability.Name: Primordial Sea
Ability.Description: Affects weather and nullifies any Fire-type attacks.

Ability.Name: Desolate Land
Ability.Description: Affects weather and nullifies any Water-type attacks.
